掚字的基本解释

掚
liǎng
整饰。

掚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎng］
［《集韻》里養切，上養，來。］
(1)整饰。
(2)同“倆”。

掚字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　掚； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页438第04
【集韻】【韻會】里養切【正韻】良獎切，?音兩。整飾也。【左傳·宣十二年】御下兩馬。【註】兩，或作掚。【周禮·夏官·環人掌致師註】引春秋傳作掚馬。　又【集韻】力讓切，音亮。義同。

掚字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
掚字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎng］
[In "Jiyun", raise the cut, raise it up, come. ]
(1) Finishing.
(2) Same as "two".
Smash
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　掚; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 438 04
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Li Yangqi [Zheng Yun] Good award cut, two sounds. Finishing also. [Zuo Zhuan·Xuan Twelve Years] Under the two horses. [Note] Two, or make a beating. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Huanrenzhangzhizhi Note】Introducing the Spring and Autumn Period to make a horse.　[Jiyun] Forced to cut, the sound is bright. The same meaning.
